answers.answer: The ALH issue would depend on whether Atypia was found ... The ADH issue is a bit different. Tamoxifen has been proven to reduce the risk of developing breast cancer after ADH diagnosis by nearly 50%. I would advise you to discuss in detail all the options with your Oncologist as well as your Internal Medicine Specialist. The only family history that would be important here is your Sister's breast cancer. Radiation is also sometimes recommended after surgery for ADH.  Regards ....
